messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello Im your captain, if you need to tell me somthing I'm always here

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Find that fucker and bring her corpse to the chef.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Daddymememaster. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Security Notice: Any and all theft, destruction of propriety, or assault is Punishable by death!!! Security is 100% allowed to execute people breaking these laws! Good Day

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hold out until escape gets here, Med bay bring meds for the shuttle so nobody gets too injured

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Holds the ships get here Immedently thank you!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: ENGENEERING TRY AND FIX THE POWER ASAP

messages.author: Grandpa Stan (Head of Personnel)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">The CE has been suspected as a TERRORIST! Will we capture him?</font>
